name: Wear Droid
description:
THIS GAME IS ANDROID WEAR ONLY

Mad Professor constructs droids to test them for strength. It all depends on your reaction and speed! Do not dissapoint the professor, or your droid will be sent to the dump!

Wear Droid — it's wear version of "Perfect Droid" game! Now, you can play it on your watch!
- Good 3d Graphics
- 6 Droids to unlock
- Progressive gameplay difficulty
- Easy to control on your watch!

ATTENTION, please. If you have Moto 360, game will run in landscape view (sideways).
I'm currently work on this problem.

Try it out!
Also you can download phone version of "Perfect Droid for free! Check it out on Google Play!
